title: The Living Image: Double Trouble, the CIA, The Japanese, and the Russians hunt the Look-A -Likes
description: THE LIVING IMAGE - Science Fiction - Thriller - Spies and Counter/SpiesWhat would you do if you found your own double?Sabrina discovers hers is part human and something else. Something more, maybe something unhuman. The situation become harrowing when the CIA, The Russians, and a Japanese businessman will do anything to possess the woman she names Eve. Sabrina is afraid she'll never have a normal life again.Eve wakes into a mature body, but has to learn what it means to be human. And most importantly, to act like one. She's attracted to a Russian spy, working for his home country. Will he turn her in, or run away with her?The CIA wants to study her. Maybe make a super soldier with great strength and a computer-like brain for fast thinking on the battlefield. The KGB wants to abduct her for the technology, to make more of these so called super humans. The Japanese don't care if they have to tear the woman to pieces - they want to know how she was made.Can these very different women work together to evade the dark forces trying to capture and exploit them? Genetic Engineering, Science Fiction, Thriller, Clones, Twins. Romantic science fiction
author: P.M. Richter
